name: PEP
description:
P.E.P Is an online 8 Player PvEvP game set in a zombie filled coastal United States City.
Loot, Upgrade, and kill your way through the city in 5 Gamemodes.



Play Extraction to explore the city and fight both AI/Player zombies, using an arsenal of unique weapons/throwables as you attempt to reach your extraction site.
Or play TDM, Gun Game, Or Dog Tags to fight other Human Survivors of the zombie outbreak as AI zombie's horde attack both teams!



Or Play as a team against infinite waves of zombie and special creatures in the new "Horde" mode! Buy unique upgrade to your character to survive as long as possible.



Use An Arsenal Of unique Gadgets to call in Cluster Strikes, Mounted Turrets, Vehicles, and more!
